types1:Item.types1:Name: tf_JOB_Tracking_Template_Sample_Mapping
types1:Item.types1:Description: Example Task Flow template to use as a starting point to develop new task flows

taskflow.name: tf_JOB_Tracking_Template_Sample_Mapping
taskflow.description: Example Task Flow template to use as a starting point to develop new task flows

parameter.name: taskField
parameter.operation: temp.tmp_job_ID concat("'",$temp.tmp_job_ID ,"'") (:we need to pass quotes to properly parasmetrize the query:)

operation.expression:
let $job_output := $temp.SampleMapping[1]/fault[1] let $detail := <detail> Error Message: {$job_output/reason/text()} </detail> return (:We have to replace line breaks from the text as there seem to be defect to pass parameters to DI task whenstring param contains line breaks :) replace($detail/text(),"
"," ")

parameter.name: taskField
parameter.operation: temp.tmp_job_ID concat("'",$temp.tmp_job_ID ,"'") (:we need to pass quotes to properly parasmetrize the query:)
